name: Warm Potato Salad
keywords: gluten-free, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegetarian, pepper, potato, yogurt, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 pound tiny new potatoes or other, larger boiling potatoes
12 ounces whole red pepper or 11 ounces ready-cut peppers (2 1/2 to 3 cups)
1 small bunch tarragon, enough for 2 tablespoons minced
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Scrub potatoes. Cook tiny potatoes whole in water to cover. Cube large potatoes, and cook the same way. The whole potatoes will take 10 to 20 minutes, depending on size; the cubed potatoes 7 to 10 minutes.
Wash, trim, seed and dice the red peppers; mince the shallots.
Wash, dry and mince the tarragon.
Whisk vinegar, oil and mustard; stir in yogurt, red pepper, shallots and tarragon.
When potatoes are cooked, drain; dice whole potatoes, and add to salad. Season with salt and black pepper.
